properties.name: clientId
properties.description: RequiredUsed as the alias for your key in the Android Key Store.

properties.name: username
properties.description: Used to create credential string for encrypted token and as alias to retrieve the cipher.

properties.name: password
properties.description: Used to create credential string for encrypted token

properties.name: token
properties.description: Required for decrypt()Encrypted user credentials to decrypt upon successful authentication.

properties.name: disableBackup
properties.description: Set to true to remove the "USE BACKUP" button

properties.name: maxAttempts
properties.description: The device max is 5 attempts. Set this parameter if you want to allow fewer than 5 attempts.

properties.name: userAuthRequired
properties.description: Require the user to authenticate with a fingerprint to authorize every use of the key.New fingerprint enrollment will invalidate key and require backup authenticate tore-enable the fingerprint authentication dialog.

properties.name: dialogTitle
properties.description: Set the title of the fingerprint authentication dialog.

properties.name: dialogMessage
properties.description: Set the message of the fingerprint authentication dialog.

properties.name: dialogHint
properties.description: Set the hint displayed by the fingerprint icon on the fingerprint authentication dialog.
